EmailTemplate.description: It will Go when an attachment added to case
EmailTemplate.name: AttachmentTriggerTemplate
EmailTemplate.subject: New Attachment Added To Your Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Please be advised that Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} regarding {!Case.RecordType} located at {!Case.Street__c} had a new attachment. The {!Case.Department__c} has added an attachment on your case.
You may track the status of your request using the case number provided via our website at http://www.phila.gov/311/pages/default.aspx, or reply to this email, dial 3-1-1, or for outside of Philadelphia please dial 215-686-8686. Please note updates to the website may take up to 48 hours to appear.
Regards, Philly311 Customer Support
Rate Us From Here: Take 30 seconds to tell us how we are doing. http://philadelphia.force.com/survey/TakeSurvey?id=a0N1600000VnqcmEAB&cId={!Contact.Id}&caId={!Case.Id}
